greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = minimal m >= 0 that makes primorial P(n)*2^m-1 prime.
comment: The values of n in A103515
mathematica: nmax = 2^2048; npd = 2; n = 2; npd = npd*Prime[n]; While[npd < nmax, tn = 0; tt = 1; cp = npd*tt - 1; While[(cp > 1) && (! (PrimeQ[cp])), tn = tn + 1; tt = tt*2; cp = npd*tt - 1]; Print[tn]; n = n + 1; npd = npd*Prime[n]]
results.author: _Lei Zhou_, Feb 15 2005
